text: Universidad is a rapid transit station in San Juan agglomeration, Puerto Rico. It is located between Río Piedras and Piñero on the only line of the Tren Urbano system, in the city of San Juan. The trial service ran in 2004, however, the regular service only started on 6 June 2005. ==References== Category:Tren Urbano stations Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in Puerto Rico
title: Universidad station (Puerto Rico)
